article.title: My first post using Novela by Narative

article.excerpt: With the growing community interest in Gatsby, we hope to create more resources that make it easier for anyone to grasp the power of this incredible tool.

authors.bio:
I'm a web developer and a mobile photographer.

I enjoy building, learning & exploring things that live on the web.

I often write blogs and design things.
